other_title: Dragon Quest: Great Adventure of Dai
ドラゴンクエスト　ダイの大冒険 (Japanese)
plot: It starts with a kid named Dai remembering a story told to him by his grandfather, the monster magician Brass, about the defeat of the Demon Lord Hadlar by the hands of a hero who, as the story progresses, is known to be Avan.
ending_theme: "My Road, My Journey" by Jirou Dan
